title: Handoff Delays in Teledermatology Lengthen Timeline of Care for Veterans With Melanoma
details: S Byrne, C Lau, M Gopalan, S Mata-Diaz, GJ Raugi
abstract: Methods This retrospective cohort study was approved by the VAPSHCS Institutional Review Board. The study drew from secondary data obtained from VistA, the VA Corporate Data Warehouse, the Veterans Integrated Service Network (VISN) 20 …
